books.title: Heart of Darkness
books.author: Joseph Conrad
books.summary: A steamer captain in the heart of Africa witnesses the final days of a brutal ivory trader.

books.title: Riders of the Purple Sage
books.author: Zane Grey
books.summary: On a ranch in southern Utah, Jane Withersteen refuses to marry a local church elder, and together with her ranch hand and a mysterious gunman she must face retaliatory violence, theft, and murder.

books.title: Narrative of the Life of Frederick Douglass
books.author: Frederick Douglass
books.summary: Frederick Douglass describes his youth as a slave in Maryland and his desire to be a free man.

books.title: Tombstone
books.author: Walter Noble Burns
books.summary: An embellished retelling of the town of Tombstone, Arizona, during its heyday in the late 19th century, featuring famous heroes and outlaws of the American Old West.

books.title: The Wonderful Adventures of Nils
books.author: Selma Lagerlöf
books.summary: Nils Holgersson, transformed to an elf, learns the meaning of kindness during his adventures with a flock of wild geese.

books.title: Mike
books.author: P. G. Wodehouse
books.summary: A boy’s adventures in public school are filled with cricket, colorful characters, and a great deal of fun at the expense of authoritarian school masters.

books.title: Henry VI, Part I
books.author: William Shakespeare
books.summary: King Henry VI takes the throne during a time of great political division: the quarreling among English noblemen and the collapse of England’s hold in France.

books.title: The Phoenix and the Carpet
books.author: E. Nesbit
books.summary: Five children once again encounter an ancient, magical creature and go on adventures around the world with its magic carpet.

books.title: A Bid for Fortune
books.author: Guy Boothby
books.summary: A young Australian man struggles to reclaim his love from the clutches of an evil mastermind.

books.title: The Room in the Dragon Volant
books.author: J. Sheridan Le Fanu
books.summary: After an Englishman traveling in France meets a mysterious woman, he becomes embroiled in a dangerous intrigue.

books.title: Recollections of Full Years
books.author: Helen Herron Taft
books.summary: Helen Herron Taft, wife of William Howard Taft, the twenty-seventh President of the United States, recalls her life married to one of America’s most influential political figures.

books.title: Call Mr. Fortune
books.author: H. C. Bailey
books.summary: A medically-qualified detective tackles mysteries ranging from a failed assassination to incidents at an all-girls school.

books.title: The Kingdom of God Is Within You
books.author: Leo Tolstoy
books.summary: Tolstoy describes true Christianity as a non-hierarchical, nonviolent, non-coercive pursuit, and criticizes institutional Christianity as a deceptive corruption.

books.title: No Treason
books.author: Lysander Spooner
books.summary: Lawyer and political philosopher Lysander Spooner presents his case for the invalidity of the United States Constitution.

books.title: Lyrical Ballads
books.author: William Wordsworth
books.summary: A collection of pastoral poems that is considered the defining text for the beginning of Romantic-era literature.

books.title: Penguin Island
books.author: Anatole France
books.summary: A myopic saint mistakenly baptizes some penguins, ushering in a centuries-spanning satire of French history.

books.title: Short Science Fiction
books.author: Isaac Asimov
books.summary: A collection of short science fiction by Isaac Asimov, ordered by date of original publication.

books.title: Lost Face
books.author: Jack London
books.summary: A collection of short stories by Jack London.

books.title: The Path to Rome
books.author: Hilaire Belloc
books.summary: Hilaire Belloc takes a walking pilgrimage to Rome from his hometown in France, writing of the journey, sketching the sights, and digressing on a wide variety of subjects.

books.title: The Giant Raft
books.author: Jules Verne
books.summary: An ex-slave trader with an encrypted note schemes about its meaning, while a man with a secret past travels with his family down the Amazon in a giant raft to attend his daughter’s wedding.
